channel.title: 5 Forum Members WHO'VE SWORN + bonus shit I'm gonna get clobbahed for
channel.description:
##### now for memes # Welcome to top trends today we are going over 5 forum members who sworn.
## 5: Damafaud. Believe it or not, Damafaud actually swore once. He seems to have learned from his big mistakes because he vowed to never swear. I believe he still has a position in heaven.
[quote="Damafaud, post:1, topic:30890"] “Gentlemen. This is our most ambitious project so far. Don’t fuck it up,” [/quote]
## 4: Boopydoop. You're going to heck for this one, you dun goofed [quote="Jazz, post:31, topic:2617, full:true"] FUCKING
king’s guards
king’s fucking guards
or alchemist
jesus christ everyone fucking else got it [/quote]
## 3: Pug's alt. Somebody once hacked into my account and said a very rude word. I do not accept this action and he shall be condemned to hecck
[quote="Pug, post:90, topic:71184, full:true"] I cunt say it here [/quote]
## 2: Memesky. Memesky already had a guaranteed spot in hecc but he swore, therefore committing the tenth sin and going to the tenth layer of hecc. SWEARING. When Memesky said this disgusting word, 500 children died. [quote="Memesky, post:1649, topic:65232, full:true"] Im converted by fire shit cl [/quote]
## 1: Marl, why would you betray us like this. You had a guaranteed spot in heaven lol. The fudge bro why did you murder my hope like you murdered me in SFoL 31.
[quote="Marluxion, post:289, topic:65610, full:true"] What the fuck have you done [/quote]
# but for a serious top 5. here you go. my favorite forum members.
Top 5: 1. Lily (friend, great comments) 2. Wham (friend) 3. Livi (helps me balance often + hosts great games) 4. Squid (fun to talk to) 5. Hippo (probably imo the funniest person on the forums, people ~~Only Hippo~~ would say Meme's comedic timing is great but when Hippo makes jokes. He does it better.)
Bottom 5: 1. Pug 2. Pug 4. Pug 5. Pug 3. Memesky (nah jk, we had a truce actually.)
Seriously, Do a bottom 5 if you want but I just want y'all's opinions. Please post your top 5s in the comments :eyes: I definitely will read the worst ones because I'm sure I'd fill em up.
> Someone's average bottom 5: > 1. Pug > 2. Pug >4. Pug >5. Pug >3. Pug
